name: Back to Sleep
description:
You just want to cozy up in bed, but you just remembered you have chores to do, and mom's coming back in minutes! Complete all the tasks before falling asleep!

Use AWSD or arrow keys to move, press 'space' to interact with objects. Avoid enemies or jump on them!

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #40 game jam. Any feedback on how I can improve is appreciated!
